</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets camera focus range in format [distance, blur]. blur param - sets the camera focus blur. It does not automatically commit changes (see [[camCommit]]). Use [-1, -1] to disable focus completely. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camSetFocus''' focusRange </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> focusRange: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_camera [[camSetFocus]] [50, 1];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[camCreate]], [[camCommand]], [[camDestroy]], [[camCommit]], [[camPrepareFocus]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
